products.title: Splash Frost Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Frost Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £7.96 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Frost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour.  It will freshen up any space within the home or office.  Splash Frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.  Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe.  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product. 
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX1579 Fabric Colour: Frost Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Paper White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Paper White Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £8.83 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Our Splash Paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Our Roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX1892 Fabric Colour: Paper Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Ivory Off-White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Ivory Off-White Roller Blind in White/Cream. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Ivory Off-White is a fabulous shade, perfect to pair with natural wooden tones in the home. Our roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as our made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product ID: SDB-RBX2328 Fabric Colour: Ivory Off-White Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Frost
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Frost Standard Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 200mm Max Width: 3048mm
 	Min Drop: 200mm Max Drop: 2913mm
 	Fabric Joins: Blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Dependant on the fabric patterns will be matched.
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Tube: Robust Aluminium Tube
 	Control: Sidewinder or Spring Control
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
